Class RentA_FilmController

  • java.lang.Object
    • kickstart.controller.RentA_FilmController

public class RentA_FilmController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • rentafilm

        @RequestMapping(value="/rentafilm",
                method=GET)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\',\'ROLE_AUTHORIZED\')")
public java.lang.String rentafilm(rentAFilmForm rentafilmform,
                                                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap)
        Rents a new movie. Only the Boss or AuthEmp can rent it.
        Parameters:
        rentafilmform - rentAFilmForm form managing the inputs
        modelMap - ModelMap Provided by Spring
        Returns:
        Returns you to the rentafilm page or if fails(for example not auth. person/account) login page

      • addfilm

        @RequestMapping(value="/rentafilm",
                method=POST)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\',\'ROLE_AUTHORIZED\')")
public java.lang.String addfilm(@ModelAttribute(value="rentafilmform")
                                                                                                                                                                          rentAFilmForm form,
                                                                                                                                                                          org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                                                                                          org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                                                                                                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                                                                                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Boss or Authorized can add a new movie to the movie catalog.
        Parameters:
        form - rentAFilmForm form managing the inputs
        model - Model provided by Spring
        result - BindingResult contains form errors
        redirectAttributes - provided by Spring
        Returns:
        returns a Sting "success" if everything worked otherwise "login"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - regular exception throw
